body:
Hey guys most of you know who I am and you know I record Avicus and so I present you my first episode of "Avicus Commentary w/ Zegita". I just go around and talk about stuff whilst playing some Avicus so yeah pretty cool huh.

If you enjoy it give it a like and feedback is highly appreciated as well. Tell me if I should do more - thanks!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F68Xd1W8Nw0&feature=youtu.be
